name: GKTurnBasedMatchmakerViewControllerDelegate
desc: A protocol that handles when the status of turn-based matchmaking changes.

items.name: func turnBasedMatchmakerViewControllerWasCancelled(GKTurnBasedMatchmakerViewController)
items.desc: Handles when the player dismisses the view controller without inviting players.

items.name: func turnBasedMatchmakerViewController(GKTurnBasedMatchmakerViewController, didFailWithError: Error)
items.desc: Handles when an error occurs while the local player invites other players.
